price: Biz Kitabı sənə haqq olaraq nazil etdik. Odur ki, sən də, dini yalnız Allaha aid edərək ancaq Ona ibadət et!
arabic: إِنَّآ أَنزَلۡنَآ إِلَيۡكَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ فَٱعۡبُدِ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡلِصٗا لَّهُ ٱلدِّينَ

version.title: Azerbaijani translation - Ali Khan Mosaiv
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Azerbaijani by Khan Mosaiv. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: innā anzalnā ilayka al-kitāba bil-ḥaqi fa-uʿ'budi al-laha mukh'liṣan lahu al-dīna
